definitions.definition: located in the south, southern ; later especially, often pertaining to the southern parts of Europe.
of or characteristic of southern areas or people, especially those in the southern parts of Europe
along a north – south direction, or relative to a meridian ; or relating to meridians or a meridian

main_definition: located in the south, southern ; later especially, often pertaining to the southern parts of Europe. [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: of or characteristic of southern areas or people, especially those in the southern parts of Europe [from 19th c.]
( astronomy , geography , meteorology ) along a north – south direction, or relative to a meridian ; or relating to meridians or a meridian [from 15th c.]
